p: For DNA vaccines, animals were immunized by biolistic delivery of 1 μm gold particles coated with 1 μg of plasmid DNA using Gene Gun technology (Bio-Rad, Hercules, CA, USA), as previously described [ 28]. Blood samples were collected at day 90 by sub-mandibular puncture and the mice subsequently euthanized using CO2 inhalation. De-complemented pooled sera samples (30 min at 56 °C) were stored at −20 °C until use.
